description.value:
Wondrous item, rare
Inside this drawstring pouch is a set of 25 runes. Carved into smooth stones or pieces of yew all cut from the same branch, the runes can be used to attempt to divine the future, garner insight into a situation, or glimpse the fate of another. You can spend 10 minutes focusing on a target or subject and then draw three runes from the bag and set them before you. When you do so, make a Wisdom (Insight) check. The level of success determines the outcome of the reading.
